tool_description: The MMA Stats API can be used to retrieve information about UFC  fighters Statistics ,previous & upcoming fights, or to search for past fights involving specific fighters.
name: MMA Stats
title: MMA Stats

api_list.name: UFC Fight Night: Pereira vs. Hill (April_13_2024)
api_list.description:
**UFC Fight Night: Pereira vs. Hill**.    
  .Access a range of information about each fighter, including their win-loss record, height, weight, reach, and age. results of a particular fight or a fighter's win-loss record.

api_list.name: UFC Fight Night: Fiziev vs. Gamrot
api_list.description:
** UFC Fight Night: Fiziev vs. Gamrot**
Access a range of information about each fighter, including their win-loss record, height, weight, reach, and age. results of a particular fight or a fighter's win-loss record.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mma-stats.p.rapidapi.com/September_23_2023"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mma-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://mma-stats.p.rapidapi.com/September_23_2023"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: search fighter stats
api_list.description: The search functionality provided helps you find fighter statistics and UFC/MMA history based on their names. It compares your search criteria with the fighters' information and returns a list of fighters that match all the specified criteria, including their statistics, averages, titles, wins, losses, and more.
